name: Bike Race Master: Bike Racing
description:
Moto Bike Race Master : Moto Bike Racing in your pocket and you’ll have instant access to awesome driving thrills anytime, anyplace, and anywhere, trying, again and again, to reach the podium despite a series of increasingly surreal and testing obstacles that come rushing at you down the track in a crazy, colorful whirl.
Amazing Moto Bike Race Master Games 3D Features
- Real feel of bike stunt 3d
- Challenging mega ramp stunts.
- Full action of stuntman speed tracks.
- Unique 3D graphics & smooth controls.
- Avoid obstacles to perform crazy stunts.
- Incredible Ramps to enjoy Impossible Stunts.
Free Moto Bike Race Master Games 3D you have to perform astonishing tricks and stunt bike 3d race moto simulator. Drive in the extreme bike stunt 3d games like Moto rider catch the thrilling hours of bike stunts 3d bike racing game on mega ramp. Crazy stuntman always performs tricky stunts to show professional skills in our racing games.
developers: Thai Hoa Technology and Media Solution Joint Stock Company
publishers: THAI HOA TECHNOLOGY AND MEDIA SOLUTION JOINT STOCK COMPANY
